name: Santiam Hospital & Clinics
comments: The facility has wheelchair accessible entrances and parking.
our mission is to provide quality healthcare and promote health through various medical services, education, and support.

name: AHN Wexford Hospital
services: Advanced diagnostic imaging and laboratory capabilities
AHN Neuroscience Institute at Wexford Hospital
comments: It is part of the Allegheny Health Network (AHN) and is known for high-quality care and a 5-star rating from the U.S. Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.
Features all private inpatient rooms, an adult intensive care unit, a cafe, conference center, and terraces for respite. Free Wi-Fi is available.

95% of patients at AHN Wexford Hospital are willing to recommend it to others. Patients often praise the professional, pleasant, and caring staff, as well as the cleanliness and quietness of the facility.

name: Adirondack Medical Center-Saranac Lake

address.street: 2233 State Route 86 P.O. Box 471 Saranac Lake

services: Home Peritoneal Dialysis Training and Support
comments: Adirondack Medical Center-Saranac Lake is a short-term acute care hospital that provides 24-hour emergency care, a broad range of inpatient and outpatient services, and is the main campus for Adirondack Health.
The facility has wheelchair accessible entrances and parking lots.
All children under the age of 16 must always be accompanied by a responsible adult other than the patient.

name: AdventHealth Daytona Beach
comments: It is a highly-rated facility, recognized as the number one hospital in Volusia and Flagler counties by U.S. News & World Report and having earned 25 consecutive 'A' ratings in patient safety from The Leapfrog Group.
The facility is wheelchair accessible, including entrances, parking, restrooms, and seating areas.
The Cornerstone Café, located on the first floor, is open to guests daily with various food options.
On-site parking is available.

name: Knapp Medical Center
comments: Knapp Medical Center, a 233 bed not-for-profit hospital, serves a city and rural population of more than 175,000 people.
The facility is wheelchair accessible, including entrance, parking lot, and restrooms.
Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hospital for patients and guests.

name: Beaufort Memorial Hospital
services: Orthopedics and joint replacement (including Mako SmartRobotics)
Oncology and cancer care, with two full-service cancer centers
Primary and specialty care physician practices
comments: The hospital and all of its physician clinics are fully accredited by The Joint Commission.
It is the largest medical facility between Savannah, Georgia, and Charleston, South Carolina, and offers a wide range of inpatient and outpatient services.
The hospital offers amenities such as free WiFi and accepts credit card payments.
Secure online patient portals are available for patients to access medical records, pay bills, request appointments, and more.
The hospital reports a current patient satisfaction rating of four out of five stars, with 85% of patients willing to recommend it to others.
